48428.affected_area: Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown
live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning.
Issues in the area have come back, techs are already back on site investigating.
Issues in the area have been resolved.
Work is still being done on-site, with no ETA at this time.
Technicians are on standby to restore services once power has been restored to our equipment.

We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected areas.  Local power companies will be working overnight and into the morning, and once power is restored, services in these areas should begin working.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48428.summary: Some customers in Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48428.title: Apr 8 - Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
